availability.p: The text of the original item is in the public domain. The text encoding and editorial notes were created and/or prepared by the Walt Whitman Archive and are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0). notesStmt.note: No image of verso currently available.
This manuscript was likely composed in late June 1863; Whitman's notes suggest a date of June 20–21, 1863 for the composition of this manuscript, his visit with soldier Livingston Brooks, or both.
The following are responsible for particular readings or for changes to this file, as noted: Janel Cayer Elizabeth Lorang Ashley Lawson Tim Jackson

revisionDesc.change: added a period to file name @facs

body.ab: Livingston J. Brooks co B 17th Penn cav.
Just fever—brought in June 20—very sick—patient obedient—poor fellow
